thread.title: Excellent boutique hotel right next to The Pantheon
thread.title_full: Excellent boutique hotel right next to The Pantheon - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Cheeseroller72
title: Excellent boutique hotel right next to The Pantheon
text:
Really high quality hotel in superb location. The Pantheon is right outside! Very helpful staff, superb breakfast for non vegans (not so hot for Vegan options although the soya cappuccino was great) Very comfortable bed, clean, great view. I would definitely stay here again on further trips to Rome.
Room Tip: Room 608 was really quiet- on the side of top floor with private balcony with Pantheon view See more room tips
